Schema Design

  • Tutorial: Step by Step Database Design in SQL: Database Design and Implementation is applicable for whatever industry your in. Here is a step by step approach to designing and implementing a database in your organisation, using specific data from a sweet shop case study I implemented during my M.Sc. in Software & Information Systems.

  • 2020-A humble guide to database schema design: Having a good database schema design is crucial for building applications that will need to scale in traffic and complexity. If you happen to do a bad design choice you will see that it takes a lot of effort to stop the pattern from propagating to your backendsâ€™ services and controllers, and finally to your frontend.
